mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_user ( open_id , create_time ) VALUES ( #{open_id} , SYSDATE() )
mapper.select: SELECT t_user.id , t_user.open_id , t_user.mobile , t_user.nick_name , t_user.sex , t_user.avatar , t_user.address , t_user.birthday , (SELECT a.name FROM sys_city a WHERE a.id = t_user.province) as province, (SELECT a.name FROM sys_city a WHERE a.id = t_user.city) as city, t_user.receiver , t_user.postal_code, t_user.achievement_val, t_user.integration_val, t_user.badge_count, t_user.designation FROM t_user WHERE t_user.open_id = #{open_id}
mapper.update: UPDATE t_user SET nick_name = #{nick_name}, avatar = #{avatar}, sex = #{sex}, birthday = #{birthday}, address = #{address}, province = #{province}, city = #{city}, receiver = #{receiver}, postal_code = #{postal_code}, update_time = #{update_time} WHERE open_id = #{open_id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_user_address( open_id, province_id, province_name, city_id, city_name, address, receiver, phone, post_code, is_default, is_delete )VALUES ( #{open_id}, #{province_id}, #{province_name}, #{city_id}, #{city_name}, #{address}, #{receiver}, #{phone}, #{post_code}, #{is_default}, 0 )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM t_user_address WHERE open_id = #{open_id} AND is_delete = 0
SELECT * FROM t_user_address WHERE open_id = #{open_id} AND is_delete = 0 AND is_default = 1
SELECT * FROM t_user_address WHERE id = #{id} AND is_delete = 0
mapper.update: UPDATE t_user_address SET province_id = #{province_id}, province_name = #{province_name}, city_id = #{city_id}, city_name = #{city_name}, address = #{address}, receiver = #{receiver}, phone = #{phone}, post_code = #{post_code}, is_default = #{is_default} WHERE id = #{id} AND open_id = #{open_id}
UPDATE t_user_address SET is_delete = 1 WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT a.province_id , a.city_id , a.province_name , a.city_name , a.address , a.phone , a.receiver , b.price as courier_cost FROM t_user_address a , t_postage b WHERE a.id = b.id AND a.open_id = #{open_id} AND a.is_default = 1
SELECT COALESCE(SUM(integration_val),0) from t_user_integration WHERE open_id = #{open_id}
SELECT COALESCE(SUM(achievement_val) , 0) FROM t_user_achievement WHERE open_id = #{open_id}
SELECT count(1) from t_user_product a,t_product b WHERE a.product_id = b.id AND b.is_badge = 1 AND a.open_id = #{open_id}
SELECT t.image , t.url FROM t_shuffling t WHERE t.is_deleted = 0 AND t. STATUS = 1 AND SYSDATE() >= t.online_time AND t.cate = #{cate} ORDER BY t.weight ASC
